docs.lead_paragraph: After months of sniping and stalemate, a hyper-partisan Congress completed swift deals in recent days.

headline.main: With Flurry of Deals, and Eye on Calendar, Congress Clears Decks
headline.print_headline: With Flurry of Deals, And Eye on Calendar, Congress Clears Decks

docs.snippet: After months of sniping and stalemate, a hyper-partisan Congress completed swift deals in recent days.

docs.lead_paragraph: Costs are rising, retirement income is less secure and the golden years are lasting longer, leaving older people less to bequeath to their heirs.

headline.main: 8 Reasons You Should Not Expect an Inheritance
headline.print_headline: An Inheritance? What a Quaint Idea

docs.snippet: Costs are rising, retirement income is less secure and the golden years are lasting longer, leaving older people less to bequeath to their heirs.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Bush administration promised to provide new protections for low-income Medicare beneficiaries to ensure they can get prescription drugs promptly, at minimal cost.

headline.main: Settlement to Ease Drug Costs for Some on Medicare
headline.print_headline: Settlement to Ease Drug Costs for Some on Medicare

docs.snippet: The Bush administration promised to provide new protections for low-income Medicare beneficiaries to ensure they can get prescription drugs promptly, at minimal cost.

docs.lead_paragraph: The job market in the New York City region is starting to show the effects of layoffs on Wall Street, and rents on stabilized apartments are set to get their biggest increases in years.

headline.main: Layoffs Show on New York Unemployment Rolls
headline.print_headline: Layoffs Begin to Show on the Region’s Unemployment Rolls

docs.snippet: The job market in the New York City region is starting to show the effects of layoffs on Wall Street, and rents on stabilized apartments are set to get their biggest increases in years.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Bush administration said that the Federal Reserve should be given sweeping new powers to protect the integrity of the financial system.

headline.main: Treasury Secretary Requests Greater Powers for the Federal Reserve

docs.snippet: The Bush administration said that the Federal Reserve should be given sweeping new powers to protect the integrity of the financial system.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court said courts should consider an insurance company’s potential conflict of interest when reviewing the denial of an employee’s benefits claim.

headline.main: Court Upholds Ruling on Health Benefits
headline.print_headline: In a Ruling On Benefits, Justices Aid The Worker

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court said courts should consider an insurance company’s potential conflict of interest when reviewing the denial of an employee’s benefits claim.

docs.lead_paragraph: FEWER DEALS Bargains are getting harder to find, as low-fare carriers join the bigger airlines in raising fares and fees. Continental Airlines and United Airlines said that they would form an alliance and link their networks and operations. [A16.]
docs.snippet: FEWER DEALS Bargains are getting harder to find, as low-fare carriers join the bigger airlines in raising fares and fees.      Continental Airlines and United Airlines said that they would form an alliance and link their networks and operations....

docs.lead_paragraph: The parent of Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois said it will buy for more than $120 million a maker of software designed to help health insurance companies better manage diseases of plans' subscribers.

headline.main: Blue Cross Buys Medecision for $120 Million

docs.abstract: The parent of Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois said it will buy for more than $120 million a maker of software designed to help health insurance companies better manage diseases of plans' subscribers. Chicago-based Health Care Service Corporation, which is a mutual company owned by policyholders, said it is buying Medecision for $121 [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: House leaders struck a bipartisan deal that would provide money for the war in Iraq through the end of the Bush administration and establish a significant new education benefit for veterans.

headline.main: House Leaders Agree on War Funding
headline.print_headline: House Leaders Reach Deal On Top Spending Measure

docs.snippet: House leaders struck a bipartisan deal that would provide money for the war in Iraq through the end of the Bush administration and establish a significant new education benefit for veterans.
